Not my proudest fap but i have a word for pussies. If you feel uncomfortable over a fucking draw you already fail as a man. Go back to tumblr and whatever you wanna bitch about it do there.

V-what he said. I personally really dislike this, hence I only commented that I was uncomfortable. I 100% agree with Zettaizero's statement  in terms of it being a work of fiction. The work may be disturbing, but it is still fictional and has nothing to do with influence or laws. If something like this is illegal, then any author that ever wrote a murder or any kind of sex crime is guilty as well. Its absurd. People need to own up for their own actions. I don't have to like this work, or approve of it, but I don't have to read it either (so I didn't), I personally don't like stuff like this, but I am not gonna fault the author or try to bring legality into it.

Horrible?Messed up? Author-san is influencing readers to do the same? BITCH PLEASE! THIS IS FICTION NOTHING MORE NOTHING LESS!!, the author will not be held liable for the influence as man are born intelligent therefore they can discern what is right and wrong , whatever they do they have a will and intent on it while knowing wrong and right that's why the actor himself is only holding such explicit intent and the author is out of question for such case
